itemDescription: English literary critic and Shakespearean scholar

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edmund Kerchever Chambers,  (16 March 1866 – 21 January 1954), usually known as E. K. Chambers, was an English literary critic and Shakespearean scholar. His four-volume work on The Elizabethan Stage, published in 1923, remains a standard resource.

response: *Edmund Kerchever Chambers, Medieval and Renaissance scholar
